events.title: Introduction of the RSA Algorithm
events.description: The RSA algorithm, a public-key cryptosystem widely used for secure data transmission, was introduced by Ron Rivest, Adi Shamir, and Leonard Adleman.

events.title: Apple II Released
events.description: Apple released the Apple II, one of the first highly successful mass-produced microcomputers.

events.title: Release of Atari 2600
events.description: Atari released the Atari 2600, a home video game console that popularized the use of microprocessor-based hardware and cartridges containing games.

events.title: Launch of BSD
events.description: The first version of BSD (Berkeley Software Distribution) UNIX was released, laying the groundwork for future Unix development.
